description:
Odile aka o went through training and has petitioned to be initiated as a slave to our House. Her service to the House as a trainee has been impressive, and did not go unnoticed. We find out that she has gotten a little too excited and bragged to community members that she knew she was going to be promoted soon. She is put through one sadistic test after another to prove her worth as a TUF slave.
Her nerves get the best of her, which causes her to stumble during some of the tests, but she prevails and she is collared by the House. She is so dedicated to this that she took the name odile to prove her devotion, and the pay off is so overwhelming that it sends her into tears of happiness.
Now that she is part of our House we let the slaves loose on her as guests of The House enjoy the evening.
title: Promotion of o
